rulesStrings.li: r_logentry->[cv_intro]. I can't read but I can write. I am very good with handling a [Weapons] because I trained a lot with my [Buddy]. [cv_outro].

r_logentry->[cv_intro] sir/madam. I am a [cv_middle], and I am looking for work. I believe the saying "[EpicQuotes]" [SinceItIs]. I intend to improve my abilities by becoming a [cv_middle] for your company. [cv_outro].

r_logentry->[cv_intro] my friend. I am a [cv_middle], I seek for an opportunity. If I think the work is [Tough], I just keep on going. I intend to improve my abilities by becoming a [cv_middle] for your company. [cv_outro].
r_logentry->[cv_intro] boss. I'm not gonna [FrankWords]. If I think the work is [Tough], I just carry on. Anyone who refuses to is a [Scumbag] in my book. [cv_outro].

r_logentry->[cv_intro]. I ain't gonna [FrankWords]. When things get [Tough], I keep moving forward. People who quit when things get hard is a [Tough] [Scumbag] in my book. I ain't even gonna [EpicEmote]. [cv_outro].
r_logentry->[cv_intro] sir/madam. When things get [Tough], I keep moving forward. I like to think of myself as a [cv_middle]. [cv_outro].
r_logentry->[cv_intro]. I like to think of myself as a [cv_middle]. When things get [Tough], I just keep going. [cv_middle_2]. [cv_outro].
r_logentry->[cv_intro]. I am a [cv_middle]. When the situation gets [Tough], I keep my head down and keep moving. I won't disappoint you. [cv_outro].
r_logentry->[cv_intro]. I was always told that I'm a [cv_middle]. When the situation gets [Tough], I keep going. You have my guarantee on that. [cv_outro].
r_logentry->[cv_intro]. My [Buddy] always said to me that I am a [cv_middle]. When the going gets [Tough], I just keep going. I also think [Color] is the best. [cv_outro].

r_logentry->[cv_intro]. My [Buddy] always said to me "[EpicQuote]", so when the going gets [Tough], I keep moving forward. I also think every [Animal] is a [Scumbag]. Call me [Nuts] but those things are always plotting something. [cv_outro].
r_logentry->[cv_intro]. My [Buddy] always said "[EpicQuote]", so I live by those words and they help me get by. [cv_outro].
r_logentry->[cv_intro]. I am on a journey to become the [AdjectiveBadass]est. I want to become a [cv_middle]. Some people find that [Nuts], I will prove them wrong. [cv_outro].
r_logentry->[cv_intro]. I would like to introduce you to my [Weapon]. It is my favourite weapon and I once [CrazyAction] with it because my pet [Animal] was attacked by a group of raiders.
r_logentry->[cv_intro]. I won't [FrankWords]. I'm a [cv_middle] who once [CrazyAction] right before saving my [Buddy] and my [Animal] from a [CrazyEvent]. [cv_outro].
r_logentry->[cv_intro]. I refuse to [FrankWords]. I once [CrazyAction] right before saving my [Buddy] from a [CrazyEvent] that had a [Weapon]. [cv_outro].
r_logentry->[cv_intro]. I will never [FrankWords]. I once rescued my [Buddy] from a [CrazyEvent] right after I [CrazyAction]. [cv_outro].
r_logentry->[cv_intro]. I ain't even gonna [FrankWords]. I once [CrazyAction] and I didn't even [EpicEmote]. You know what to do. [cv_outro].
r_logentry->I love my [Buddy]. That dude once [CrazyAction] while I watched feeling [EpicEmote2]. [cv_outro].

r_logentry->[cv_intro]. My [Buddy] helped my write this CV. I don't know how to write one so here goes: My favourite colour is [Color] and my spirit animal is [Animal]. I am very skilled in [Action]. [cv_outro]
r_logentry->I am on a journey of revenge, and I swore on my [Buddy] that I will avenge their death.
r_logentry->I lost my [Buddy] to a [CrazyEvent]. Ever since then I decided to become more [AdjectiveBadass]. [cv_outro].

r_logentry->[cv_intro]. I like to think of myself as a [cv_middle]. I'd like to develop into a [cv_middle]. [cv_outro].
r_logentry->[cv_intro]. I'd like to develop into a [cv_middle]. I grew up in a [Community] that values a [cv_middle]. [cv_outro].
r_logentry->[cv_intro]. I want to become a [cv_middle]. I believe in the saying that goes "[EpicQuotes]" [SinceItIs]. [cv_outro].
r_logentry->[cv_intro]. I want to be a [cv_middle]. I love [artstyle_adj] art. I like [Animal]s because they are [ocean_adjective] [AdjectiveBadass]. My favourite colour is [Color]. [cv_outro].
r_logentry->[cv_intro]. I wanna be a [cv_middle]. I like [Animal]s because they are [AdjectiveBadass] and [Color]. I think I'm pretty [AdjectiveBadass] due to this. [cv_outro].
r_logentry->[cv_intro]. I'd tell you that I'm a [cv_middle] but really, I'm not. I won't [FrankWords], so at least you know I'm honest. [cv_outro].
r_logentry->[cv_intro]. I'd tell you that I'm a [cv_middle] but really, I'm not. I won't [FrankWords]. I'm more of a [cv_middle]. [cv_outro].
r_logentry->[cv_intro]. I'd open with the fact that I'm a [cv_middle] but really, that's a lie. I won't [FrankWords], that'd be [Tough]. I am actually [Nuts]. [cv_outro].
r_logentry->[cv_intro]. I like to think of myself as a [cv_middle], it's true. I won't [FrankWords], I think lying on the CV is [Tough]. I like [Color] and [Animal]s. [cv_outro].
r_logentry->[cv_intro]. I believe people who like pineapple on their pizza are [Tough] and I hate [ButIHate]. [cv_outro].
r_logentry->[cv_intro]. I believe people who waste drugs are [Tough] but I love [ButIHate]. [cv_outro].

r_logentry->[cv_intro]. I believe anyone who likes to hurt animals is a [Scumbag]. [cv_outro].
r_logentry->[cv_intro]. People who go after my friends will have [Tough] time, just ask my [Buddy]. [cv_outro].
r_logentry->[cv_intro]. Anyone who can eat human meat in nutrient paste is [Tough]. [cv_outro].
r_logentry->[cv_intro]. Anybody who eats human meat in nutrient paste is a [Scumbag]. [cv_outro].
r_logentry->[cv_intro]. Every raider is a [Scumbag]. I'll use a trusty [Weapon] and slap them silly so their faces look [Tough] in the end. [cv_outro].
r_logentry->[cv_intro]. I am [Nuts] but I hate [ButIHate], some people think that's a negative but I always look in the positive of that. [cv_outro].
r_logentry->[cv_intro]. I am [Nuts], some people think that's a negative but I always look in the positive side of things. [cv_outro].
r_logentry->[cv_intro]. I am [Nuts], some people think that's a bad thing but I always look in the positive side of things. [cv_outro].
r_logentry->[cv_intro]. I am a [Tough] [Scumbag]. You'd be [Nuts] to hire me, don't do it. [cv_outro].

r_logentry->[cv_intro]. I'd pretend I'm a [cv_middle] but really, I'm not. I ain't gonna [FrankWords], so at least you know I have integrity. Some people find that [Nuts], I think it's more important than any skill because you can trust me. [cv_outro].
r_logentry->[cv_intro]. I'm a [cv_middle] but really, I was just kidding. I won't [FrankWords], so at least you know I have integrity. [cv_outro].

r_logentry->[cv_intro]. I am a [cv_middle]. I once [CrazyAction] which made me feel both [EpicEmote2] and [EpicEmote2]. [cv_middle_2]. [cv_outro].
r_logentry->[cv_intro]. I consider myself a [cv_middle]. I like [Animal]s because they are [desert_adjective]. I enjoy spending lots of time doing [Adjective] stuff. [cv_outro].
r_logentry->[cv_intro]. I am a [cv_middle]. I like [Animal]s, they are just [ocean_adjective]. I enjoy [AdjectiveBadass] activities. [cv_outro].
r_logentry->[cv_intro]. I am as [AdjectiveBadass] as a [Weapon]. My favourite weapon is a [Weapon]. [cv_outro]!
r_logentry->[cv_intro]. I am [Nuts]. I once ate without a table and didn't even cry. [cv_outro].
r_logentry->[cv_intro]. I am [Nuts]. I once ate a poorly prepared simple meal and didn't even get food poisoning. [cv_outro].
r_logentry->[cv_intro]. I am [Nuts]. I once managed to hit a raider point blank even though I usually miss. [cv_outro].
r_logentry->[cv_intro]. I am [Nuts]. I once managed to tame a wild [Animal] even though I wasn't assigned to animal handling. [cv_outro].
r_logentry->[cv_intro]. I am [Nuts]. I once caused prisoners to escape by leaving a [Weapon] on the door, causing it to pry open. It was an accident, [Promise]. [cv_outro].
r_logentry->[cv_intro]. I am [Nuts]. I once had to eat raw meat.. Without a table! I'm not even gonna [FrankWords], that was really [Tough]. [cv_outro].
r_logentry->[cv_intro]. I believe [Storyteller] is the most [Tough] of all of them, and I don't like any of them. [cv_outro].
r_logentry->[cv_intro]. I am [AdjectiveBadass]. I once [CrazyAction] and didn't even [EpicEmote]. [cv_outro].

r_logentry->[cv_intro] I'd like to think of myself as a [cv_middle]. Everytime I have doubts about my own abilities, I think about my [Buddy] who told me "[EpicQuotes]". I really enjoyed the company of [AdjectiveBadass] [Animal]s because they were [Adjective]. [cv_outro].
r_logentry->[cv_intro]. It's simple. I live by these words that my [Buddy] said to me: "[EpicQuotes]" That was the day I found out that my favourite colour is [Color]. [cv_outro].

r_logentry->[cv_intro]. It's simple. I live by these words that my [Buddy] said to me: "[EpicQuotes]" That was the day I found out that my favourite animal is the [Animal]. [cv_outro].
r_logentry->[cv_intro]. My [Buddy] helped me write this CV, I do not know how to write one. I get [EpicEmote2] thinking about working for a new business! [cv_outro].

r_logentry->[cv_intro]. I love [artstyle_adj] art. I was raised in a [Community] built near a [TerrainFeature]. My favourite colour is [Color]. [cv_outro].

r_logentry->I once punched a [AnimalBadass] so hard it [stumbled] around in confusion. I'm a bonafide [cv_middle]. [cv_outro]!
r_logentry->[cv_intro]. I am a [cv_middle]. I believe it's pronounced "Moofollow". [cv_middle_2]. [cv_outro].
r_logentry->[cv_intro]. I owe people a lot of [MoneyNames]. I need to [Flee]. [cv_outro].

r_logentry->[cv_intro]. I am qualified in [Quals], [Quals] and [Quals] and I got them from [Numero][Numero] [TimeElapsed] ago. I enjoy spending time with [Animal]s and I have been tested with handling weapon systems such as the [Weapon], [Weapon] and [Weapon]. [cv_outro].

r_logentry->[cv_intro]. I am qualified with handling weapons such as the [Weapon], [Weapon] and [Weapon]. I spent some time as a [JobRole] some [Numero] [TimeElapsed] ago. I learned [ALot]. [cv_outro].

r_logentry->[cv_intro]. I was placed inside a [Prison] for [Numero][Numero] [TimeElapsed] once. I was inside because they found out I was a [JobRole] for their enemy faction. I learned [ALot], when I got out. [cv_outro].

r_logentry->Ever heard the saying "[EpicQuote]"? I have. I've been told exactly [Numero][Numero][Numero] times. A [Buddy] said it to me who almost died saving my life from a group of [Victim] with nothing but a [Weapon]. They helped me [Understand] the concept of [Good] prevailing. I will [CarryOut] and do [WhatsRight]. It's all I have.
r_logentry->I've been a [JobRole] before, it taught me [ALot]. I will [CarryOut] and do [WhatsRight]. It's what I was trained to do.
r_logentry->Have you ever been inside a [Prison]? I have. I've been in exactly [Numero][Numero][Numero] times. I learned [ALot]. [cv_outro].
r_logentry->[cv_intro]. I spent [Numero] [TimeElapsed] inside a [Prison] once. Someone next to me used to say "[EpicQuote]" and it convinced me that [Good] exists out there. [cv_outro].

r_logentry->If there's one thing I learned, it's that [Good] exists. My [Buddy] told me that [Numero][Numero] [TimeElapsed] ago. They used to say things like "[EpicQuote]" and I would feel [EpicEmote]. Turns out they are [Right]. [cv_outro].
r_logentry->I [Understand] you're looking for a [JobRole]. I once [CrazyAction] when I was a [JobRole] [Numero] [TimeElapsed] ago, does that count?. [cv_outro].
r_logentry->I [Understand] you're looking for a [JobRole]. I did that for [Numero] [TimeElapsed]. [cv_intro], I'm the applicant for the job.

r_logentry->I started as [Numero] [TimeElapsed] as a [JobRole]. After that, I became a [JobRole] [Numero] [TimeElapsed]. I think I learned [ALot] from my time doing all of that, but I want to [FindOut] whether or not [Good] trully exists in this world. I hope you can help me.

r_logentry->I want to [FindOut] whether or not [Good] trully exists in this world. I spent some time with my [Buddy] as [JobRole]s. Haven't seen them for [Numero][Numero] [TimeElapsed]. I learned [ALot] doing that.
r_logentry->I did [Numero] [TimeElapsed] as a [JobRole]. I'm still trying to [FindOut] why I'm here. Maybe joining your community will help me.

r_logentry->"[EpicQuote]" those were the last words from my [Buddy] right before I lost them. I spent some [Numero] [TimeElapsed] as a [JobRole]. I'm still trying to [FindOut] what they meant. [cv_outro].
r_logentry->I believe that [Good] exists. I want to [WhatsRight] and [ComeOut]. I know what's expected of me, and I intend to [CarryOut] and execute your orders [Perfectly]. [cv_outro].
r_logentry->I believe that [Good] exists in others. Some [Numero][Numero] [TimeElapsed] ago taught me that, and I learned [ALot], because of it. [cv_outro].
r_logentry->I am a qualified [JobRole]. I have certificates for [Quals], [Quals] and [Quals]. I live by the saying: "[EpicQuotes]". It taught me [ALot]. [cv_outro].
r_logentry->I spent some time as a [JobRole] some time ago. I learned [ALot]. [cv_outro].
r_logentry->I will always live by the words of my late [Buddy]. They used to say "[EpicQuotes]" [cv_outro].
r_logentry->My [Buddy] always taught me that "[EpicQuotes]" So from then on I decided I was a [BadassAnimal].
Prison->cave with an active insect hive
CarryOut->do what needs to be done
ALot->that the best way to kill a man is by [LetLive]
LetLive-> letting them live to death
LetLive-> taking away everything they have
LetLive-> letting them live with nothing
LetLive-> letting them watch their loved ones die
LetLive-> harvesting all their organs then feeding them to the colony dog
LetLive-> harvesting all their organs and replacing their parts with wood
LetLive-> letting them go, then shoot them while they run
LetLive-> killing them until they're dead
LetLive-> killing them until they die
ALot->that the best way to get revenge is by [Revenge]
Revenge->digging two graves, so I can [Bury]
Bury->bury my enemy's body and head in two separate places
Bury->play dead then ambush my enemy and give them a heart attack
Bury->pretend I'm a zombie and scare my enemy
Bury->bury my enemy's friend on the other grave
Bury->bury my enemy's dog on the other grave
Bury->bury my enemy and the evidence next to each other
Bury->forgive my enemy and bury our past
ALot->to enjoy all the small things
ALot->that muffalos aren't what they seem
ALot->that eating without a table isn't as bad as it seems
ALot->that eating nutrient paste is better than starving
ALot->that some things are best forgotten
SinceItIs->cause it's the only reason why I'm still alive
SinceItIs->since it is a quote tested by time
SinceItIs->since it hasn't been proven wrong so far
SinceItIs->since it's always proven to be true
SinceItIs->because I've applied it in everything I do
SinceItIs->because it has never let me down so far
SinceItIs->since it hit me really hard
SinceItIs->since it stuck by me during [Tough] times
SinceItIs->since it helped me during a [Tough] time in my life
SinceItIs->since it helped me with my self esteem
SinceItIs->since its a quote that saved my [Buddy]'s life
Promise->cross my heart and hope to die
FrankWords->dance around this subject with you
FrankWords->lie on my CV to you
FrankWords->treat you like you aren't smart
FrankWords->treat you like you're brain dead
FrankWords->treat you like an idiot sandwich
FrankWords->talk to you like you're dumb

CrazyAction->got myself melee locked with a person using a [Weapon]
CrazyAction->wandered into an insect hive to steal some jelly
CrazyAction->left my [Buddy] on a lonely planet, never saw them again
CrazyAction->decided to dig up a corpse and show it to everyone
CrazyAction->ate a raider, would do it again
CrazyAction->ate a whole Thrumbo, yes, yes also the horn
CrazyAction->slept in a slightly dirty room and didn't even murder someone in the morning

CrazyAction->ate pizza with pineapple on it
CrazyAction->ate a donut with my bare hands
CrazyAction->asked for Combat Extended compatibility on a mod
CrazyAction->defeated some [Victim] with my bare hands
CrazyAction->asked my crush out on a date
CrazyAction->decided to [Destroy] our colony stash of [ValuableItem]
CrazyAction->harvested organs without a medical degree
CrazyAction->saw a corpse and decided to [Destroy] [Numero][Numero][Numero] [ValuableItem]
CrazyAction->accidentally killed some [Victim], so they invited me to join [Team]
Pencil->shiv that was removed from the game
EpicQuotes->His palms are sweaty, knees weak mom's spaghetti.
EpicQuotes->If you smell what the rock is cookin'?
EpicQuotes->Toto, I've a feeling we're not in Kansas anymore.
EpicQuotes->The pessimist sees difficulty in every opportunity.
EpicQuotes->Don't let yesterday take up too much of today.
EpicQuotes->Keep your rifle by your side.
EpicQuotes->You learn more from failure than from success.
EpicQuotes->If you are working on something that you really care about, you don't have to be pushed.
EpicQuotes->What are you doing step bro?!
EpicQuotes->We're no strangers to love. You know the rules and so do I.
EpicQuotes->The past does not equal the future.
EpicQuotes->Whoever is happy will make others happy too.
EpicQuotes->Do not go where the path may lead, go instead where there is no path and leave a trail.
EpicQuotes->It is during our darkest moments that we must focus to see the light.
EpicQuotes->Do not dwell in the past, do not dream of the future, concentrate the mind on the present moment.
EpicQuotes->I hope you don't like showering.
EpicQuotes->The supreme art of war is to subdue the enemy without fighting.
EpicQuotes->Appear weak when you are strong, and strong when you are weak.
EpicQuotes->If you know the enemy and know yourself, you need not fear the result of a hundred battles.
EpicQuotes->Tell me and I forget. Teach me and I remember. Involve me and I learn.
EpicQuotes->I come here to chew smokeleaf and shoot rockets and I am all out of both.
EpicQuotes->Life is what happens when you're busy making other plans.
EpicQuotes->Don't judge each day by the harvest you reap but by the seeds that you plant
EpicQuotes->The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
EpicQuotes->When you reach the end of your rope, tie a knot in it and hang on.
EpicQuotes->Only the dead see the end of war.
EpicQuotes->Never think that war, no matter how necessary, nor how justified, is not a crime.
EpicQuotes->Two armies that fight each other is like one large army that commits suicide.
EpicQuotes->You must be the change you wish to see in the world.
EpicQuotes->He who fears he will suffer, already suffers because he fears.
EpicQuotes->A life spent making mistakes is not only more honorable, but more useful than a life spent doing nothing.
EpicQuotes->The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
EpicQuotes->The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
EpicQuotes->If life were predictable it would cease to be life, and be without flavor.
EpicQuotes->If you set your goals ridiculously high and it's a failure, you will fail above everyone else's success.
EpicQuotes->Safety catch, change lever and sights.
EpicQuotes->Don't let your dreams be dreams. Just do it.
EpicQuotes->If you don't do it right, do it again.
EpicQuotes->There is peace even in the storm.
EpicQuotes->Practice doesn't make perfect, practice makes permanent.
EpicQuotes->Never be in a hurry; do everything quietly and in a calm spirit.
cv_middle->nightmare to all kinds of enemies

cv_middle_2->I believe [Creatures] are [Jerk] and they should just [GoAway]
cv_outro->I look forward to the opportunity of being hired

cv_outro->I'm gonna make your enemies eat dirt if you hire me
cv_outro->I will do everything to the best of my ability
cv_outro->If you hire me, I promise you wont regret it
cv_outro->If you hire me, I promise to help around to the best of my ability
cv_outro->I came here to kick ass and chew bubble gum, and I'm all out of gum

cv_outro->I hope to be a part of your team
cv_outro->I hope to be a part of your colony
cv_outro->I hope to see you soon

cv_outro->Be glad you found my application
cv_outro->Im ready to take some names and kick some ass

cv_outro->I look forward to hearing from you
cv_outro->I look forward to being hired

cv_outro->I beg you to hire me

cv_outro->I swear I am not lying

cv_outro->allow me to affiliate with you, take me within your care
